text: Gharghoda is a town and a nagar panchayat in Raigarh district in the state of Chhattisgarh, India. ==Geography== Gharghoda is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Gharghoda It has an average elevation of 258 metres (846 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Gharghoda had a population of 8103. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Gharghoda has an average literacy rate of 65%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 76%, and female literacy is 54%. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Raigarh district
title: Gharghoda
